sentences.english: Are you like Maggie and George, stuck living in the suburbs?
sentences.chinese: 是否像M和乔治那样，在市郊呆板地生活？

sentences.english: It happened to be in the Washington, D.C., suburbs, near my home.
sentences.chinese: 店址选在首都华盛顿市郊，恰在我家附近。

sentences.english: The Jordache garage was on the outskirts of town, so they got a lot of transient traffic.
sentences.chinese: 乔达虚汽车修理厂位于市郊，那里过往车辆很多。

sentences.english: The Black Dragon Pond is located outside Lijiang, Yunnan province.
sentences.chinese: 黑龙潭位于云南丽江市郊。

sentences.english: But today in our cities and suburbs, neighboring is not common.
sentences.chinese: 但如今在市区或者市郊，比邻而居并不常见。

sentences.english: Salinity content and characteristic of farmland soil in Shanghai suburb was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了上海市郊部分旱作农田土壤盐分特征。

sentences.english: Toward the suburb the houses begin to thin out.
sentences.chinese: 靠近市郊的地方房屋渐渐稀少。

sentences.english: In the meantime, the Campbells have given her a life in a 8)suburban neighborhood where she can be a kid.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，坎贝尔一家让她在市郊过着她的童年。

sentences.english: The 47th Paris International Air Show has kicked off at Bourget, a Paris suburb.
sentences.chinese: 第47届巴黎国际航展在巴黎市郊布尔热拉开帷幕。

sentences.english: Flinders Street Station, hub of Melbourne's suburban railways.
sentences.chinese: 弗林德斯街站是墨尔本市郊铁路的枢纽。

sentences.english: Small houses in the urban district are becoming very expensive, but the suburbs they are ten a penny.
sentences.chinese: 市区小房的价格越来越高，可是在市郊却很便宜。

sentences.english: A preliminary report of wild sugarcane resources around Nanning and western Guangxi.
sentences.chinese: 南宁市郊及桂西甘蔗野生资源的初步调查。

sentences.english: With gas prices high, many suburbanites yearn for a shorter commute.
sentences.chinese: 油价上涨，许多市郊居民开始怀念短途通勤。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the outskirts of Dandong are home to the easternmost section of the Great Wall of China.
sentences.chinese: 丹东市郊还是中国长城东段的源头。

sentences.english: The new suburbia will be far more environmentally friendly—what I call “greenurbia.”
sentences.chinese: 新的郊区将更为环保，我们称其为“绿色市郊”。

sentences.english: Apart from, Shisanling, the most famous Ming Tomb is Xiaoling, located in the suburbs of Nanjing.
sentences.chinese: 十三陵之外最著名的明陵是坐落于南京市郊的明孝陵。

definition: outer suburbs/remote outskirts of a city
travel time/expected time for a car journey
no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
